entry.title: In Israel, Tradition Requires 10 to Attend a Funeral. Hundreds Came.
entry.content: Thousands of people have attended funerals of people they never knew over the past few days.

entry.title: Gaza Residents Brace for Israeli Offensive After Evacuation Demand
entry.content: Residents of Gaza were bracing for a more powerful assault by the Israeli military, which on Friday demanded a mass evacuation of some of the territoryâ€™s most densely populated neighborhoods.

entry.title: Inside Gaza, People Desperately Seek Safety
entry.content: An evacuation warning from the Israeli military sowed panic in the sealed-off Palestinian enclave.
